channel.title: Surveillance on Te(k|ch) blog
channel.description: Recent content in Surveillance on Te(k|ch) blog

item.title: Let's Talk About FlexiSpy
item.description: Introduction: I started this blog post to explain the context of FlexiSpy leaks and show some information I have found during my analysis. This information is incomplete and there is still plenty analysis of source code or binaries to be done. I have uploaded the source code and binaries on github so that everyone can help with it. I will try to report in this articles the publications I have seen on it, but feel free to ping me on Twitter if you see new information or have any question.
